speaker: OFFICER #1
line: Sir.

speaker: OFFICER #2
line: Captain.

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: What have you got?

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: I'm not quite sure, sir. We picked up some paint approximately two minutes ago.

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Looks like the damn thing's just hanging there.

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: Yes, sir. It's approximately two-hundred meters below the ice. Looks to be about eighty meters across and it's noisy.

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Noisy, how?

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: It's emitting radio signals across the spectrum but it's... it's just random noise, sir. We can't detect any pattern.

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Get me Pacific Command on the satellite uplink.

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: Yes, sir.

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Yes, admiral. I don't know what we found but it appears to be some kind of craft. Yes, sir, that's correct. But we're on a cartography mission, admiral. My crew isn't prepared to... Yes, sir. Understood, sir. Set a course heading 0-4-7.

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: Toward the object, sir?

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Weapons room.

speaker: MAN
line: Aye, sir. Lock torpedoes on target. Prepare to fire on command.

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: Captain, shouldn't we at least attempt to identify this object first?

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: We have our orders, Lieutenant.

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: But, sir...

speaker: MAN
line: Everything's down, negative!

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Reactor's gone down.

speaker: MAN
line: Over here...

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: Engine room?

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: That won't work, captain. We've only got battery power.

speaker: CAPTAIN
line: I'm going down there. Prepare to surface at once!

speaker: RADAR OFFICER
line: Surface into what? We're under thirty-two feet of glacial ice.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully? Are you there? Scully? What's going on?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, sorry.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who was that?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's a wrong number. Where have you been, Mulder? I've been trying to get a hold of you.

speaker: MULDER
line: I, I was trying to reach you. I went by your house but you weren't there. I got here as quickly as I could.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why didn't you call when you got my message?

speaker: MULDER
line: I, I, I did call. I, I couldn't get through.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Put your hands against the wall.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, what are you doing?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I said put your hands against the wall!

speaker: MULDER
line: What's wrong?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Do it!

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, it's me...

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know who you are.

speaker: MULDER
line: Okay, I'm going to take my left hand and reach into my pocket and get my I.D., okay? Just don't shoot me. I got shot once and I didn't much care for it.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I said keep your hands up.

speaker: MULDER
line: Where is he? That was him on the phone, wasn't it? Tell me where he is.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know what you're talking about.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: He's been here. Your partner is alive.

speaker: MULDER
line: How do you know?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: He took her to get me.

speaker: MULDER
line: There's no sign of a break-in. She wouldn't have just let him in.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: She might not have known who he was. She might have thought it was you. He's going to contact you. He's going to say he wants to make a trade, your partner's life for mine.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why, why does he want to kill you?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: Because I know how to kill him.

speaker: MULDER
line: How?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: By piercing the base of his skull.

speaker: MULDER
line: That would kill anybody.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: Yes, but this is the only way to kill him and it must be precise. I'm fairly sure it'll work.

speaker: MULDER
line: Fairly sure?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: He's got powers I've never seen before. If it doesn't work, there's a chance you could die.

speaker: MULDER
line: From what?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: Their blood is toxic, human exposure to it is fatal. I know this must seem incredible to you...

speaker: MULDER
line: No, no, no, no, no... that's just it. It doesn't seem incredible at all. Now, how do we find him?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: We don't. He'll find us.

speaker: (THE TIME IS 12
line: 38. Mulder paces around his apartment as Samantha sits on the couch.)

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: He'll call.

speaker: MULDER
line: You're sure?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: I know what he wants.

speaker: MULDER
line: And if he doesn't get it?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: I know this is hard for you, Fox...

speaker: MULDER
line: No, it's not hard. It's unbelievable.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: You don't believe me.

speaker: MULDER
line: After twenty-two years, why come back?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: I've explained to you...

speaker: MULDER
line: No, no, you've explained only what you had to! I know next to nothing about these people you call your parents or about the man who wants to kill them.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: The men you've been seeking are the progeny of two original visitors, clones who have been attempting to establish a colony here since the late 1940's.

speaker: MULDER
line: A colony?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: Loosely. The community, by necessity, is dispersed. There are clones identical to my parents living in virtually every part of the country.

speaker: MULDER
line: What are they trying to accomplish?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: It's their belief that our stewardship of the planet is being forsaken, and that by default, they'll someday become the natural heirs.

speaker: MULDER
line: And in the meantime?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: Through hybridization, they've been working to erase that aspect which has forced the community to scatter... their identical natures.

speaker: MULDER
line: All the clones worked in abortion clinics, why?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: Access to fetal tissue. Though the biologies are incompatible, they finally found a way to combine human DNA with alien DNA.

speaker: MULDER
line: And this man... why has he been sent to kill them?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: The experiments weren't sanctioned. It was considered a dilution of their species, a pollution of their race. So a bounty hunter was dispatched to destroy them and terminate the colony.

speaker: MULDER
line: That's a good story... but I've heard a lot of good stories lately.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: I've got no reason to lie to you. I'm your sister, Fox, you have to trust me.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who is it?

speaker: SKINNER
line: It's Skinner. Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: The door's open. Make yourself at home.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What's going on here, Agent Mulder? Why are the lights out?

speaker: MULDER
line: Orders from my opthamologist.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Are you all right?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah, I'm fine.

speaker: SKINNER
line: I've been trying to reach you and Agent Scully.

speaker: MULDER
line: I haven't checked my messages.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Are you aware that Agent Scully incarcerated four men with the federal marshal's office? And those men are now missing?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: It's all right, it's not him.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What the hell is going on here, Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: This is my sister, Samantha Mulder.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What?

speaker: MULDER
line: I haven't had time to explain, Agent Scully is missing.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What do you mean, missing?

speaker: MULDER
line: Hello.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, it's me.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, where are you?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know, I'm... I'm in a telephone booth. He's got my gun, Mulder. He says he's going to kill me if you don't give him what he wants.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, what does he want?

speaker: SCULLY
line: A woman who's with you. He says you'll know what I'm talking about.

speaker: MULDER
line: All right, tell him we'll negotiate.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He doesn't want to negotiate. He says he wants to make a trade.

speaker: MULDER
line: All right, let me speak to him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He wants you to be at Memorial Bridge at Bethesda in one hour.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, I need time, I need more time than that.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder...

speaker: SKINNER
line: Where is she? What's this about a negotiation?

speaker: MULDER
line: We don't, we don't have any time. If I ever needed your help, your trust, I need it now.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Mulder's in position.

speaker: MULDER
line: We just need to get him out of the car. Make him think we're going to make a trade. We just need one shot.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER
line: To the base of the neck.

speaker: MULDER
line: These guys can hollow out a dime at two-hundred yards. And, Samantha. Do not take any unnecessary risks out there. Scully?

speaker: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
line: Bring her out.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Take your shot when you got it.

speaker: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
line: Step close. Right up close.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, you all right?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm okay.

speaker: SHARPSHOOTER
line: I lost the shot.

speaker: MULDER
line: There's no way out. We've got both sides of the bridge covered. Now let her go.

speaker: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
line: Tell me where she is.

speaker: MULDER
line: Let her go! Samantha! Samantha!

speaker: RAFT DRIVER
line: Spread out. Clear!

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder...

speaker: MULDER
line: You should be in the hospital, Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I was discharged an hour ago and I asked to come here. Have they found anything yet?

speaker: MULDER
line: Nothing yet. You think she could've survived?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Maybe... but the water's thirty-six degrees.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, maybe she went into hypothermic shock. I've heard about people who have lived after being stranded in water like this... eight to ten hours.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, why didn't you tell me on the phone that it was her?

speaker: MULDER
line: I couldn't tell you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why not?

speaker: MULDER
line: Cause you'd never let me go through with it.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you sure that it's your sister?

speaker: MULDER
line: Why would you even question me on that?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Because back at the motel, Mulder, it was you but, but it wasn't you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, it was her.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well, then who is this man and what does he...

speaker: MULDER
line: He's an alien.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Is that what you're going to tell Skinner?

speaker: MULDER
line: I already told Skinner, that was the easy part. Now I got to tell my father.

speaker: WILLIAM MULDER
line: You didn't have me come all this way to give me good news. What is it, Fox?

speaker: MULDER
line: Samantha's gone... Dad. I lost her.

speaker: WILLIAM MULDER
line: What do you mean, you lost her?

speaker: MULDER
line: There was a man... he was holding my partner hostage in exchange for Samantha.

speaker: WILLIAM MULDER
line: You let this man take your sister. Isn't that what you're trying to tell me?

speaker: MULDER
line: I, I can't explain it to you, but, um... I believed I was doing the right thing, Dad.

speaker: WILLIAM MULDER
line: Was this your decision?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yes. I'll tell Mom.

speaker: WILLIAM MULDER
line: Do you realize what losing her again is going to do to your mother? Do you?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm sorry, Dad. I'm sorry. I'm... I'm sorry.

speaker: WILLIAM MULDER
line: Your sis... Samantha left this at the house for you.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, it's me.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, she left a path in case we got separated. I think she's alive.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, I think you should come back as soon as you can.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why? What'd you find?

speaker: SCULLY
line: It's your sister. We just pulled her body out of the river. Mulder, I'm so sorry.

speaker: MULDER
line: Are you sure?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah. You know... whatever you're feeling, you can't blame yourself.

speaker: MULDER
line: What about a second body? Did you find a second body?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, not yet.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'll be there as soon as I can.

speaker: FEMALE AGENT
line: Agent Scully? There's something you need to see.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What is it?

speaker: FEMALE AGENT
line: It's the body we pulled from the water. Something strange is happening.

speaker: MULDER
line: Federal agent. Put your hands where I can see them and turn around. Slowly. Who are you?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #1
line: She's dead, isn't she?

speaker: MULDER
line: What the hell is going on?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #1
line: Come, please. There's not much time.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who are you?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #1
line: Please.

speaker: MULDER
line: It was all a lie.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #1
line: We needed your help. We knew you could be manipulated.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #2
line: He'll be coming. We must hurry now.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #3
line: The man who's been sent to kill us.

speaker: MULDER
line: He's dead.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #1
line: How do you know?

speaker: MULDER
line: He was shot. In the back of the neck!

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #2
line: How did he die?

speaker: MULDER
line: He fell off a bridge... with one of you.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #3
line: Then we don't know for sure. You could have been followed. Come with me. This way, Agent Mulder. The rest of us are dispensable. She was the first. The one from which we all came. The one you must save.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm not your savior.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #4
line: You must help us. You have no choice.

speaker: MULDER
line: No, I... I do have a choice and my choice is to walk out of here.

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #4
line: We know where your sister is. Ask yourself, Agent Mulder, how else would we know so much about her?

speaker: SAMANTHA MULDER CLONE #3
line: He's here.

speaker: FIREMAN
line: I found one! Sir, we're going to get you out of here.

speaker: MULDER
line: What about the others?

speaker: FIREMAN
line: We got real lucky. There are no others.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. Wait. There were women in here.

speaker: FIREMAN
line: We looked. You're the only one here.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. You've got to keep looking...

speaker: SCULLY
line: After being treated for smoke inhalation, Agent Mulder was released from Samaritan Hospital in satisfactory condition. At his request, the abortion clinic where he was found has been searched repeatedly but the bodies of the women he insists perished there were not found. My report on this case remains incomplete. Many aspects continue to defy explanation including the identities of the identical men and women. Agent Mulder's claim of alien origins cannot be substantiated. The man suspected in their disappearances is still at large...

speaker: SCULLY
line: ...and has now been charged with the death of F.B.I. Special Agent Barret Weiss, whose body has been quarantined at the U.S. Medical Research Institute of Infectious Diseases. Weiss' cause of death involved a thickening of the blood. It is now believed that he was subjected to a virulent strain of virus whose origin and behavior are also unexplainable. It is my hope that further analysis of this contagion will aid in the solution of this case. This is a retrovirus?

speaker: GARDNER
line: Yes, but none of us here have ever seen anything like it. Do you recognize it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Was the thickening of Agent Weiss' blood an immunological response to the virus?

speaker: GARDNER
line: Apparently. When the body's exposed to it, it triggers a massive production of red blood cells. Now, take a look at this. We took a second culture and were able to control it's growth.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What did you do to it?

speaker: GARDNER
line: All we did was lower the temperature by five degrees fahrenheit.

speaker: SCULLY
line: So the virus is inhibited by cold.

speaker: GARDNER
line: Knocked out by it. For some reason, this retrovirus goes dormant at cold temperatures.

speaker: SCULLY
line: We pulled a body from the river yesterday that was chilled near freezing. When it started to thaw, it began to corrode.

speaker: GARDNER
line: Corrode?

speaker: SCULLY
line: If you find out anything else, you let me know as soon as possible.

speaker: X
line: You wanted to see me?

speaker: MULDER
line: How was the opera?

speaker: X
line: Wonderful, I've never slept better. I don't like these hasty public meetings, Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm sorry. I need your help.

speaker: X
line: It's over. The fat lady is singing.

speaker: MULDER
line: I need to know what you know.

speaker: X
line: Okay, they're all dead.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. One of them is alive, the one who was sent to kill them. Where is he?

speaker: X
line: A nuclear submarine located his craft in the Beaufort Sea five days ago. They were ordered to destroy it but they were disabled. An attack fleet left port from Anchorage this morning to make sure this man does not leave.

speaker: MULDER
line: I got to get up there.

speaker: X
line: You'll only win the war if you pick the right battles, Agent Mulder. This is a battle you can't win.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, it's me, are you there?

speaker: FROM
line: Fox Mulder, 000517" We hear Mulder reading the letter.)

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully, when you get this message, I will be too far away for you to stop me, but where I'm going I cannot allow you to follow. I won't let you jeopardize your life and your career for reasons purely personal to me. You were right, Scully... you said a line has to be drawn somewhere. I'm drawing it for you here. I'll contact you when I can.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sir? I'm sorry to come unannounced, sir, but your assistant wasn't at her desk.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What is it, Scully?

speaker: SCULLY
line: May we speak off the record, sir?

speaker: SKINNER
line: About?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Mulder. He's gone.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Where?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I don't know, I was hoping that you could tell me or help me to find out.

speaker: SKINNER
line: When I spoke to Agent Mulder the day before yesterday, he said he was going to take some time off.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He told me the same thing but I don't think this matter with his sister is settled. Sir, is there any way that you can reach him through unofficial channels?

speaker: SKINNER
line: I can't help you, Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Please?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Scully, you and I both have a greater responsibility to consider and that is to the F.B.I. Agent Mulder's actions in this case are in violation of his duties, his oath of trust and bureau protocol. He's risked my position, your life.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Agent Mulder has saved my life!

speaker: SKINNER
line: If he wanted or expected you to the same, he would have told you where he was going. Please close the door on your way out, Agent Scully.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where is Mulder?

speaker: X
line: Sorry, I must have the wrong apartment.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where's Mulder? I need to know, damn it!

speaker: X
line: I'm sorry, you've mistaken me for someone else.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm losing time!

speaker: X
line: I'm sorry. I can't help you. Excuse me.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Did you tell her what she needed to know? How hard do you want to make this?

speaker: X
line: No harder than it has to be. I've killed men for far less.

speaker: SKINNER
line: You pull that trigger, you'll be killing two men. Now I want to know where Mulder is. Agent Mulder took a commercial flight to Tacoma, Washington. From there, he caught a military plane to Deadhorse, Alaska. He used his F.B.I. credentials to charter a Rollagon all-terrain vehicle. It's still a ten-mile hike across the ice. These are the coordinates of his final destination.

speaker: SCULLY
line: How did you get this?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Unofficial channels.

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey! Stop! Who are you?

speaker: MAN
line: Lieutenant Terry Wilmer.

speaker: MULDER
line: Step out of there! Come out! What happened to you?

speaker: MAN
line: I don't know. We, uh... we just lost power. We, we... we drifted under the ice for days. Then, um... then we hit a...

speaker: MULDER
line: Don't look at me, face forward!

speaker: MAN
line: We hit a shallow patch and punched through, okay? That's what happened.

speaker: MULDER
line: So why did you run?

speaker: MAN
line: A man came. He, um... he sealed most of the men below decks without any air and, uh... and then he started to execute the rest of us. Every... they're all dead. I, uh... I thought you were him, I didn't know if you were him.

speaker: MULDER
line: How is it you managed to survive?

speaker: MAN
line: I hid under the body of a chief petty officer, okay? I, uh... I played dead. What's this for? What are you, crazy?

speaker: MULDER
line: No. I'm just tired and you're not getting back to your ship until I get the truth. Now tell me where my sister is.

speaker: MAN
line: I don't know what you're talking about.

speaker: MULDER
line: Base of the neck! Now, you tell me how I can find her and I'll let you get back to your ship before it's destroyed!

speaker: MAN
line: Please... please... You're making a really big mistake.

speaker: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
line: If I wanted to, I could've killed you many times before.

speaker: MULDER
line: Where is she?

speaker: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
line: Is the answer to your question worth dying for? Is that what you want?

speaker: MULDER
line: Where is she? Just tell me where she is.

speaker: ALIEN BOUNTY HUNTER
line: She's alive. Can you die now?

speaker: NURSE
line: No change in B.P. or pulse.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm Dana Scully, I'm Agent Mulder's partner. What are his vitals?

speaker: DOCTOR
line: He's suffering from extreme hypothermia.

speaker: SCULLY
line: No... you've got to get him out of the tub.

speaker: DOCTOR
line: He's dying, he's lost all his body heat.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You've got to listen to me! If you keep him in there, you're going to kill him! The cold is the only thing that's keeping him alive.

speaker: NURSE
line: His heart stopped!

speaker: DOCTOR
line: Give me one amp of epinephrine in a cannula!

speaker: SCULLY
line: You don't know what you're dealing with here! Agent Mulder has been exposed to a retrovirus resulting in hyperviscosity syndrome.

speaker: DOCTOR
line: I want you out of my E.R. right now. Nurse!

speaker: NURSE
line: Yes, doctor. Ma'am...

speaker: SCULLY
line: His blood has thickened...

speaker: NURSE
line: Ma'am...

speaker: SCULLY
line: That's why his heart is failing!

speaker: DOCTOR
line: No, his heart is failing because he's lost all his body heat!

speaker: SCULLY
line: No, the only thing saving him right now is the hypermetabolic state induced by the cold. Now, if you don't do what I'm saying, you are going to kill him! Let's get him out of that tub now.

speaker: MAN
line: A hundred joules, charged and ready.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Clear!

speaker: WOMAN
line: Clear. No rhythm.

speaker: MAN
line: Charge?

speaker: DOCTOR
line: No.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Clear!

speaker: WOMAN
line: Clear.

speaker: DOCTOR
line: I'm picking up a faint pulse.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I want a digoxin 0.1 milligram I.V. Hang a heparin drip at 1,000 units per hour. And get him two units of fresh frozen plasma now.

speaker: DOCTOR
line: This patient's not even in...

speaker: SCULLY
line: He's going to make it.

speaker: MAN
line: Let's get the plasma going. Okay, let's get a second line ready.

speaker: OTHER MAN
line: Push the adrenaline...

speaker: SCULLY
line: Transfusions and an aggressive treatment with anti-viral agents have resulted in a steady but gradual improvement in Agent Mulder's condition. Blood tests have confirmed his exposure to the still unidentified retrovirus whose origin remains a mystery. The search team that found Agent Mulder has located neither the missing submarine nor the man he was looking for. Several aspects of this case remain unexplained, suggesting the possibility of paranormal phenomena... but I am convinced that to accept such conclusions is to abandon all hope of understanding the scientific events behind them. Many of the things I have seen have challenged my faith and my belief in an ordered universe......but this uncertainty has only strengthened my need to know, to understand, to apply reason to those things which seem to defy it. It was science that isolated the retrovirus Agent Mulder was exposed to, and science that allowed us to understand its behavior. And ultimately, it was science that saved Agent Mulder's life. Hey. How you feeling?

speaker: MULDER
line: Like I got a bad case of freezer burn. How did I get here?

speaker: SCULLY
line: A naval reconnaissance squad found and choppered you to Eisenhower Field. Thanks for ditching me.

speaker: MULDER
line: I... I'm sorry, I... I couldn't let you risk your life on this.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did you find what you were looking for?

speaker: MULDER
line: No. No. But I... I found something I thought I'd lost. Faith to keep looking.
